Posts.Content: Hi my name is Michelle and I run a Non Profit called The Pinkee Promise. We are currently working on a charity photo book called The Pink Project. The Pink Project is a photo book which will bring awareness to two organizations - The Los Angeles Breast Cancer Alliance and RAINN (Rape, Abuse, and Incest National Netwrork) We are looking for breast cancer survivors, friends and family members to be part of a photo shoot that will be included in the book. If you are interested or know a survivor who may be interested in being part of a photo shoot please contact me: --- Message edited by CancerCompass staff: for personal protection, email address removed. Please review CancerCompass Member Guidelines at http://www.cancercompass.com/common/guidelines.html --- . You can also check out our website www.thepinkproject.com and email me with any questions!
Posts.Title: The Pink Project
